features: 【Compatible with Shark Steam Mop S1000】The steam mop pads is approx. 12.4'' x 6.7'', fits Shark Steam Mop S1000, S1000A, S1000C, S1000WM, S1001C

【Exceptional Quality】Crafted from premium ultra-fine fiber materials, steam mop pads excel in absorbency and quick drying. The inner sandwich mesh lining effortlessly releases steam, while the scrub strips tackle tough, sticky stains.

【Safe on All Type Floor】HOMEXCEL steam mop replacement pads are designed for safe use on all hard surface floors, including hardwood, tile, laminate, marble, linoleum, and wooden surfaces. Our steam mop pads protect your floors from scratches or smears, making them ideal for cleaning your home, office, kitchen, living room, and bathroom.

【Easy to Install and Replace】Our steam mop pads refills feature a user-friendly velcro fastener, making installation and replacement a breeze for anyone. Not only are they reusable and long-lasting, but they also promote environmental sustainability.
【Money Saving】 You'll save both time and money with these reusable, machine-washable mop pads. Get 2 mop pads for extended use, giving you a clean and comfortable home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value in steam mop heads
reviews.reviewText: Steam mops are great for cleaning hard floors but they're never supplied in sufficient quantity to get more than a small area clean before the pads are completely filthy and need washing.These pads are functionally identical to the Shark pads and attach via velcro. They clean and scrub just like the Shark pads and launder just as well. There are slight stylistic differences to the Shark pads but work just as well. They're also priced at a much better value than Shark's own pads. We ended up buying a second package in addition to this evaluation package to allow us to routinely do the kitchen and breakfast nook that is constantly needing touchups from dropped food (and resultant dog slobber) and muddy dog paws.Excellent item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit like a charm!
reviews.reviewText: I was so surprised at how much this looked just like the original. It fit well and does a great job. It holding up and has already been through its first wash. I definitely recommend if you need a replacement.

reviews.reviewText: I should have looked on Amazon before spending BB ti man e looking BB in the stores. Just what I was looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thinner than originals yet works well
reviews.reviewText: These are definitely thinner than the originals but are OK. They don't have the foot release, so make sure it's cool before pulling it off. They work and for the price you can't beat it. I find even the originals never come clean and are stained. It's OK as they just get dirty again! Nice product and i would buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love that I got two types of mops. One has a little bit of texture to help with scrubbing if need be. They come out clean when washed. And they've upheld their velcro stick. I've washed them two or three times, and still the Velcro holds strong.
